title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not update immediately.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to 18 points.

Observed Behavior (OB): The label font size does not change right away.

Expected Behavior (EB): The label's height should adjust to match the font size.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):

1. Create a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to 18 points.
